This interactive website accompanies the manuscript [*A brain precursor atlas reveals the acquisition of developmental-like states in adult cerebral tumours*](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-022-31408-y). To report any issues please contact the creator of the website Daniel Kunz (djk44@cam.ac.uk), or Benjamin Simons (bds10@cam.ac.uk). For questions about the experiments please contact Peter Dirks (peter.dirks@sickkids.ca).

It might take some time to initially generate all plots for your session.

Using this [link](https://shiny-server.gurdon.cam.ac.uk/djk44/brain-development_app/) you can open the app in an external window as well.
